TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlForm extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl

summary.span: 提供对服务器上的 HTML 元素的编程访问。

span.span: Provides programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件是在 Web 窗体页上的服务器控件的容器。The control is a container for server controls on a Web Forms page. 回发到服务器的所有服务器控件必须都置于开始标记和结束标记之间控件。All server controls that post back to the server must be placed between the opening and closing tags of an control. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 允许只有一个控件 Web 窗体页上处于活动状态。ASP.NET allows only a single control to be active on a Web Forms page. 如果存在多个活动控件在 Web 窗体页中，公共语言运行时将引发请求页时出现异常。If there is more than one active control on a Web Forms page, the common language runtime will throw an exception when you request the page. 但是，你可以使用控制在何处每个对象都包含一个管理，因为只有一个任何给定时刻处于活动状态。You can, however, use a control where each object contains one control, because only one is active at any given time. 您可以控制的行为通过设置其属性的控件。You can control the behavior of the control by setting its properties. 若要指定窗体的数据的编码类型，设置属性。To specify the encoding type for the form's data, set the property. 方法 (`GET`或`POST`)，浏览器使用窗体将数据发布到服务器的通过将设置指定处理属性。The method (`GET` or `POST`) that a browser uses to post form data to the server for processing is specified by setting the property. > [!CAUTION] > 默认情况下， 属性设置为 `POST`。By default, the property is set to `POST`. 你可以修改此属性的值`GET`，但这可能中断内置的状态和回发由 ASP.NET 页面框架提供的服务。You can modify the value of this property to `GET`, but this might break the built-in state and postback services provided by the ASP.NET page framework. 你可以配置这些控件可实现接口为发送到不同的目标页。You can configure controls that implement the interface to post to a different target page. 这被称为跨页发送。This is referred to as cross-page posting. 有关详细信息，请参阅[跨页发布 ASP.NET Web 窗体中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b)。For more information, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b). 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类来创建简单的表单。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to create a simple form. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/CS/htmlformcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/VB/htmlformvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"窗体"文字字符串。The "form" literal string.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的新实例控件并将它放置在网页上。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the control and place it on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlFormCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlFormCtor/CS/htmlformctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlFormCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlFormCtor/VB/htmlformctorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 HTML 表单的 action 属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the action attribute of the HTML form.

value.span: HTML 表单的 action 属性。

span.span: The action attribute of the HTML form.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你使用属性时重写原始请求的 URL，但你想要保留的 HTML 窗体的操作属性的原始 URL。You use the property when you rewrite the URL of the original request but you want to retain the original URL for the action attribute of the HTML form. 设置属性设置为你想要保留的 URL 的值。Set the property to the value of the URL that you want to retain.

Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ClientID As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ClientID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 为 控件生成的控件标识符

span.span: Gets the control identifier that is generated by [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] for the control

value.span: 由生成的控件标识符[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]为控件。

span.span: The control identifier generated by [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要防止命名冲突时呈现控件的多个实例，[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]自动生成一个唯一页上的每个控件的值。To prevent naming conflicts when multiple instances of a control are rendered, [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] automatically generates a unique value for each control on a page. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property.

returns.span: 包含 控件的子服务器控件的 。

.property instance string DefaultButton
Public Property DefaultButton As String
public: property System::String ^ DefaultButton { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置按 Enter 键时会引起回发的 控件的子控件。

span.span: Gets or sets the child control of the control that causes postback when the ENTER key is pressed.

value.span: 在加载 后要显示为默认按钮的按钮控件的 。

span.span: The of the button control to display as the default button when the is loaded.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性，允许您指定用户可以通过形式 （例如文本框） 的输入控件中按 ENTER 导致回发。The property lets you specify that users can cause a postback by pressing ENTER in an input control in the form (such as a text box). 你可以为默认按钮中指定派生自任何控件接口除控件。You can specify as a default button any control that derives from the interface except the control. 如果被引用的控件属性不是派生自、引发异常。If the control that is referenced by the property does not derive from , an exception is thrown. 如果你正在使用母版页并且你设置属性从内容页中，使用属性按钮。If you are using master pages and you set the property from a content page, use the property of the button. 有关为母版页的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 母版页](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e53eedf-8304-4e7a-aed1-691a2623b28b)。For more information about master pages, see [ASP.NET Master Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e53eedf-8304-4e7a-aed1-691a2623b28b). 属性可能会不导致回发以下方案：The property might not cause a postback in the following scenarios: - 当焦点位于外部表单中输入的控件，并按 enter 键。Pressing ENTER when focus is outside the input controls in the form. 不能保证默认回发操作触发。The default postback action is not guaranteed to be triggered. - 当焦点位于多行文本框内，并按 enter 键。Pressing ENTER when focus is inside a multi-line text box. 在多行文本框中，预期的行为是，并按 enter 键在文本框中创建一个新行。In a multi-line text box, the expected behavior is that pressing ENTER creates a new line in the text box. 在某些浏览器，并按 enter 键多行文本框触发器内部回发。In some browsers, pressing ENTER inside a multi-line text box triggers a postback. 在这种情况下，如果你想输入以改为创建一个新行，你可以附加到的输入控件的 JavaScript 函数。In that case, if you want ENTER to create a new line instead, you can attach a JavaScript function to the input control. 该脚本应捕获 ENTER 键，并停止回发。The script should capture the ENTER key and stop the postback. 例如，你可以使用要添加的客户端脚本的属性集合`onKeyPress`事件。For example, you can use the property collection to add client script for the `onKeyPress` event. - 指定为默认按钮的控件。Specifying a control as a default button. 仅和控件都受支持。Only and controls are supported. - 更改以编程方式在异步回发期间的属性。Changing the property programmatically during an asynchronous postback. 可以通过添加一个或多个页面上启用异步回发到页面的控件。Asynchronous postbacks can be enabled on a page by adding one or more controls to the page. 有关详细信息，请参阅[UpdatePanel 控件概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)和[局部页面呈现概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性来设置导致回发的默认控件。The following example shows how to set the property to set the default control that causes a postback. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm.DefaultButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.DefaultButton/CS/htmlform.defaultbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm.DefaultButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.DefaultButton/VB/htmlform.defaultbuttonvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 作为默认按钮引用的控件的类型不是 。

span.span: The control referenced as the default button is not of the type .

MemberSignature.Value: public string DefaultFocus { get; set; }
.property instance string DefaultFocus
Public Property DefaultFocus As String
public: property System::String ^ DefaultFocus { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置窗体上的控件，该控件要在加载 控件后显示为具有输入焦点的控件。

span.span: Gets or sets the control on the form to display as the control with input focus when the control is loaded.

value.span: 窗体上的控件的 ，该控件要在加载 后显示为具有输入焦点的控件。

span.span: The of the control on the form to display as the control with input focus when the is loaded.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问要显示为具有输入控件的窗体上的控件时焦点加载控件。Use the property to access the control on the form to display as the control with input focus when the control is loaded. 可以选择的控件显示时带有一个视觉提示，该值指示它们具有焦点。Controls that can be selected are displayed with a visual cue indicating that they have the focus. 例如，具有焦点的控件均显示有定位在其内部的插入点。For example, a control with focus is displayed with the insertion point positioned inside of it. 此外可以使用设置具有焦点的控件或方法。The control with focus can also be set using the or methods. 这些方法通过具有优先级属性。These methods have precedence over the property. 如果在调用这些方法之一来设置与控件的焦点的值忽略属性。If either of these methods are called to set the control with focus, the value of the property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置属性指定的控件在窗体上显示为具有输入焦点的控件，在窗体加载时。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to display a specified control on a form as the control with input focus when the form loads. 当`Form1`呈现，请注意，插入点位于中`TextBox1`，以指示，`TextBox1`是具有焦点的控件。When `Form1` renders, notice that the insertion point is positioned in `TextBox1`, indicating that `TextBox1` is the control with focus. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm.DefaultButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.DefaultButton/CS/htmlform.defaultbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm.DefaultButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.DefaultButton/VB/htmlform.defaultbuttonvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string Enctype { get; set; }
.property instance string Enctype
Public Property Enctype As String
public: property System::String ^ Enctype { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置将窗体的数据发送到服务器时浏览器使用的编码类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding type a browser uses when posting the form's data to the server.

value.span: 字符串，它包含编码类型。

span.span: A string that contains the encoding type.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示使用浏览器的默认内容类型。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), indicating that the browser's default content type is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的编码类型浏览器用于将数据发回服务器。Use the property to specify the encoding type a browser uses to post data back to the server. 下表显示了常见的编码类型。The following table shows the common encoding types. |编码类型Encoding type|描述Description| |-------------------|-----------------| |application/x-www-form-urlencodedapplication/x-www-form-urlencoded|窗体数据被编码为名称/值对。Form data is encoded as name/value pairs. 这是标准的编码格式。This is the standard encoding format.| |multipart/form-datamultipart/form-data|窗体数据被编码为页面上的每个控件的单独部分的消息。Form data is encoded as a message with a separate part for each control on the page.| |文本/无格式text/plain|窗体的数据被编码以纯文本，而无需任何控件或格式字符。Form data is encoded in plain text, without any control or formatting characters.| 编码类型的详细信息，请参阅[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on encoding types, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的编码类型浏览器用于将数据发送回服务器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the encoding type the browser uses to send data back to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/CS/htmlformcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/VB/htmlformvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string Method { get; set; }
.property instance string Method
Public Property Method As String
public: property System::String ^ Method { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示浏览器将窗体数据发送到服务器进行处理的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates how a browser posts form data to the server for processing.

value.span: 字符串，它指示浏览器向服务器发送窗体数据的方式。

span.span: A string that indicates how a browser posts form data to the server.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于指定如何浏览器将窗体数据发送到服务器进行处理。Use this property to specify how the browser sends form data to the server for processing. 所有浏览器支持两个常见方法是`GET`和`POST`。The two common methods supported by all browsers are `GET` and `POST`. > [!CAUTION] > 你可以重写此属性和使用的默认值`GET`方法而不是`POST`。You can override the default value of this property and use the `GET` method instead of `POST`. 但是，因为`GET`请求是有限的数据量中它们可以包括，使用`GET`方法可能在某些情况下，会导致由 ASP.NET 页面框架提供的回发和状态管理功能失败。However, because `GET` requests are limited in how much data they can include, using the `GET` method can, in some cases, cause the postback and state management capabilities provided by the ASP.NET page framework to fail. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定，将窗体数据发回服务器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that form data is posted back to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/CS/htmlformcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/VB/htmlformvb.aspx#1)]

.property instance string Name
Public Overridable Property Name As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取 控件的标识符名称。

span.span: Gets the identifier name for the control.

value.span: 包含 的标识符名称的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the identifier name for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定的唯一标识符名称控件。Use the property to determine the unique identifier name for an control. 在此实现中，获取此属性返回的值属性。In this implementation, getting this property returns the value of the property. 但是，将属性设置不会分配一个值的属性。However, setting the property does not assign a value to the property. 将属性设置不会分配一个值给此属性因为属性必须具有相同的值属性。Setting the property does not assign a value to this property because the property must have the same value as the property. > [!NOTE] > `name`属性不是一个符合 XHTML 的属性且不会将其呈现而不考虑 asp.net`xhtmlConformance`设置。The `name` attribute is not an XHTML-compliant attribute and is not rendered by ASP.NET regardless of the `xhtmlConformance` setting.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void OnInit (EventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void OnInit(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub OnInit (e As EventArgs)
protected public: override void OnInit(EventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains event data.

summary.span: 为 控件引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当收到通知时方法，Web 服务器控件必须执行任何所需创建并设置实例的初始化步骤。When notified by the method, Web server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 在此阶段的服务器控件的生命周期中，控件的视图状态尚未填充。In this stage of the server control's life cycle, the control's view state has yet to be populated. 此外，当调用此方法时，无论是否的子级或父级到该控件不能访问其他服务器控件。Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control. 不保证其他服务器控件都可创建并准备好进行访问。Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

para.span: 在重写方法在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

para.span: 此外，调用基类的方法可确保控件正确设置为网页窗体和页面的视图状态保持不变。

span.span: Additionally, calling the base class's method ensures that the control is properly set as the Web page form and the page's view state is persisted.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void OnPreRender (EventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void OnPreRender(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 为 控件引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正好在呈现之前调用方法控件。The method is called just prior to rendering the control. 如果属性设置为`true`、方法注册智能导航脚本文件引用，以使其获取呈现。If the property is set to `true`, the method registers the smart navigation script file reference so that it gets rendered. > [!NOTE] > 属性已弃用 ASP.NET 2.0 版中。The property has been deprecated in ASP.NET version 2.0.

span.span: The that receives the rendered content.

summary.span: 将 控件呈现给指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the control to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法上呈现 HTML`

exception.span: 只在引用 实例的情况下才呈现 控件。

span.span: The control is not rendered without a reference to the instance.

para.span: 在重写方法在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便正确呈现控件的子控件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control's child controls are correctly rendered.

span.span: The that receives the rendered content.

summary.span: 将 控件的属性呈现到指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the control's attributes to the specified object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法使用方法来检查控件的属性，以确保它们可以开始标记中呈现`
`HTML 元素。The method uses the method to check the control's attributes to ensure that they can be rendered in the opening tag of a `` HTML element. 此外，方法呈现`method`， `action`，和`onsubmit`属性控件。Additionally, the method renders the `method`, `action`, and `onsubmit` attributes of the control. 如果在中设置的控件 ID属性不实现接口，引发异常。If the control ID set in the property does not implement the interface, an exception is thrown. 主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

exception.span: 在 属性中设置的控件 ID 类型不是 。

span.span: The control ID set in the property is not of the type .

para.span: 在重写方法在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便正确呈现控件的属性。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control's attributes are correctly rendered.

protected public: override void RenderChildren(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

span.span: The that receives the rendered content.

summary.span: 呈现 控件的子控件。

span.span: Renders the child controls of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呈现客户端脚本，以确保浏览器焦点设置到中指定的控件属性。The method renders client script to ensure that the browser focus is set to the control specified in the property. > [!NOTE] > 指定控件属性优先于指定控件属性。A control specified by the property takes precedence over a control specified by the property.

exception.span: 网页有多个服务器端 标记。

span.span: The Web page has more than one server-side tag.

para.span: 在重写方法在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便正确呈现控件的子控件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control's child controls are correctly rendered.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void RenderControl (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void RenderControl(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub RenderControl (writer As HtmlTextWriter)
public: override void RenderControl(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

span.span: The that receives the form control content.

summary.span: 将 控件呈现给指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the control to the specified object.

para.span: 在重写方法在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便正确呈现控件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control is correctly rendered.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool SubmitDisabledControls { get; set; }
.property instance bool SubmitDisabledControls
Public Overridable Property SubmitDisabledControls As Boolean
public: virtual property bool SubmitDisabledControls { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，指示是否强制客户端上被禁用的控件提交它们的值，以在页回发到服务器后允许这些控件保留它们的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether to force controls disabled on the client to submit their values, allowing them to preserve their values after the page posts back to the server.

value.span: 如果强制客户端上被禁用的控件提交它们的值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if controls disabled on the client are forced to submit their values; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否强制客户端在页回发时提交它们的值上被禁用的控件。Use the property to specify whether to force controls disabled on the client to submit their values when the page posts back. 这样，被禁用的控件在页发回发到服务器后保留它们的值。This allows the disabled controls to preserve their values after the page posts back to the server. 当属性设置为`false`，使用客户端脚本已禁用表单上的控件将不会提交到服务器下次在页回发。When the property is set to `false`, controls on the form that have been disabled using client script will not be submitted to the server the next time the page posts back. 因此，存储由已禁用控件的任何值都将丢失。As a result, any values stored by the disabled controls are lost. 若要允许被禁用的控件在页发回发到服务器后保留它们的值，设置属性`true`。To allow the disabled controls to preserve their values after the page posts back to the server, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置到窗体上的属性`true`导致禁用了客户端脚本可以在页发回发到服务器后会保留其值的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property on a form to `true` to cause controls disabled by client script to maintain their values after the page posts back to the server. 在此示例中，如果你设置属性`false`，然后单击**发送回**按钮，在 HTML 文本框中的文本将丢失，并且无法再选择 HTML 复选框。In this example, if you set the property to `false` and then click the **Post back** button, the text in the HTML text box is lost and the HTML check box is no longer selected. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm.SubmitDisabledControls#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.SubmitDisabledControls/CS/htmlform.submitdisabledcontrolscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm.SubmitDisabledControls#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.SubmitDisabledControls/VB/htmlform.submitdisabledcontrolsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string Target { get; set; }
.property instance string Target
Public Property Target As String
public: property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置框架或窗口以呈现发送到服务器的信息结果。

span.span: Gets or sets the frame or window in which to render the results of information that is posted to the server.

value.span: 显示发送到服务器的信息结果的浏览器窗口或框架。

span.span: The browser window or frame that displays the results of the information posted to the server.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，这会刷新具有焦点的窗口或框架。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的目标窗口或框架，显示发布的信息的结果到服务器。Use the property to specify the target window or frame that displays the results of the information that is posted to the server. 重定向的发布到服务器的结果是信息的一项高级的任务。Redirecting the results of the information posted to the server is an advanced task. 不建议使用此属性只是为了回发。Using this property simply to post back is not recommended. > [!NOTE] > 属性呈现为`target`属性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target`属性`form`XHTML 1.1 中不允许的元素。The `target` attribute on `form` elements is not allowed in XHTML 1.1. 因此，如果呈现的标记必须符合 XHTML 标准，或者必须符合辅助功能标准，则不要设置属性。Therefore, if the rendered markup must conform to XHTML standards or must conform to accessibility standards, do not set the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 的 XHTML 标准](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)和[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97) and [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13). 值必须以字母 a 到 Z （区分大小写），除了下列特殊值，其中以下划线开头范围的开头。The value must begin with a letter in the range of A to Z (case-insensitive), except for the following special values, which begin with an underscore. |目标值Target value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|将内容呈现在上一个框架集父级中。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜索窗格中呈现内容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 及更高版本支持 `_search` 目标值。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the `_search` target value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定在新的未划分框架的窗口中显示的信息的结果回发到服务器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a new, unframed window to display the results of the information posted back to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlFormTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlFormTarget/CS/htmlformtargetcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlFormTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlFormTarget/VB/htmlformtargetvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override string UniqueID { get; }
.property instance string UniqueID
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property UniqueID As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ UniqueID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取分配给 控件的唯一编程标识符。

span.span: Gets the unique programmatic identifier assigned to the control.

value.span: 分配给 控件的唯一编程标识符。

span.span: The unique programmatic identifier assigned to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来获取分配给的唯一编程标识符控件。Use the property to get the unique programmatic identifier assigned to the control. 此属性重写基实现来返回一个常量值时控件包含在-实现除页，如自定义服务器控件的对象。This property overrides the base implementation to return a constant value when the control is contained in an -implemented object other than a page, such as a custom server control. 如果命名的容器是一个页，的值控件的返回属性。If the naming container is a page, the value of the control's property is returned. 属性和属性始终返回相同的值。The property and the property always return the same value. 这非常有用控件是否呈现在浏览器需要控件的和属性相同。This is useful when the control is rendered on a browser that requires the control's and properties to be the same. 若要保持同步，这些属性属性始终返回的值属性。To keep these properties synchronized, the property always returns the value of the property. > [!NOTE] > `name`属性不是符合 XHTML 的属性，默认情况下不会呈现 asp.net。The `name` attribute is not an XHTML-compliant attribute and by default is not rendered by ASP.NET. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用要检索的唯一标识符属性控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to retrieve the unique identifier for an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm.UniqueID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.UniqueID/CS/htmlform.uniqueidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm.UniqueID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.UniqueID/VB/htmlform.uniqueidvb.aspx#1)]
